overview: UFC lightweight champion Benson Henderson didn’t take the easy way to the top of the 155-pound weight class. But with skill, heart and determination, ”Smooth” has become one of mixed martial arts’ most exciting fighters and compelling figures. In this must-see, two-disc collection, relive Henderson’s rise while watching his greatest bouts — including battles with Frankie Edgar, Nate Diaz, Anthony Pettis, Donald Cerrone and Clay Guida.
title: Benson Henderson: Rising Up
